DOC.brief_title: A Study on Improving Detection and Management of Suicide Risk Among Depressed Patients in Primary Care
DOC.detailed_description: After intervention of training on the identification and management of depression and suicide risk in primary health care professionals, the ability of detection and management of suicide risk among depressed patients in primary care is expected to be improved compared to baseline evaluation.
